function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased mobile traffic during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased movement and interaction","Mitigation":"Limit physical interaction and enforce strict hygiene measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, virtual queuing systems, online appointment booking systems","People":"General public, retail staff, delivery personnel","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, retailers"},{"Description":"Online retailers promoting AR app downloads","Impact":"Potential increase in physical interaction for AR experiences and transactions","Mitigation":"Encourage contactless AR experiences, promote virtual try-on features, and offer online customer support","Technologies":"AR technology, virtual try-on solutions, online customer service platforms","People":"Customers, retail staff, AR developers","Owner":"Online retailers, AR technology providers"},{"Description":"Underutilization of touch-enabling sensory technologies in online retail","Impact":"Inability to provide tactile, olfactory, and gustatory information in online retailing, leading to reduced sensory experience","Mitigation":"Develop and implement sensory-enabling technologies for online retail, utilize tactile interfaces and sensory feedback devices","Technologies":"Sensory-enabling technologies, tactile interfaces, sensory feedback devices","People":"Customers, online retailers, technology developers","Owner":"Online retailers, technology developers"}]}
